description: Ranch base sauce with grilled chicken pieces, mushroom slices, mozzarella cheese, diced tomatoes and crushed garlic. Finished off with delicious drizzle of Dynamite Sauce and chopped parsley.

The ultimate mix of Chicken together with Mushrooms, Red Onions, Green Peppers, fresh Tomatoes, Olives and melting mozzarella cheese.
